articles.title: U.S. cities have nowhere to put their recycling

articles.title: Pompeo, Netanyahu push continued pressure on Iran
articles.description: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu pushed their commitment to applying continued pressure on the Iranian regime and touted a "tremendous alliance" between the United States and Israel. Watch their remarks.

articles.title: How investors can navigate this tax season's many changes
articles.description: Tax season is a mixed bag under Trump's new tax law, especially for investors who can no longer deduct their expenses
articles.content:
Bad news for investors this filing season: Under Trump's Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, itemized deductions are gone, meaning investment expenses are no longer deductible.
